item.title: [SGP][Network] - Backbone issue
item.description:
Jul 18, 22:12 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 18/07/2022 00:00 UTC
End Time : 18/07/2022 22:00 UTC

Root cause : A network equipment was at the origin of this incident

Jul 18, 15:17 UTC
Identified - Start time : 18/07/2022 00:00 UTC
Service impact : OVH customers connected on Equinix may have some issues to join OVH servers
Root cause : A network equipment caused the incident
